Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier police activity at Damen. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier police activity at Damen.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.
Allow extra travel time.
